Effect Description: Jump up to 30ft horizontally or 15ft vertically without a running start.
When an enemy moves within 5ft, you can jump 10ft away without provoking an attack.
Use an object, reload a weapon, or open a door while keeping your main hands full.
You have Advantage on saving throws against being knocked Prone or Shoved.
You can squeeze through gaps as small as 1 inch wide without slowing down.
When targeted by a ranged attack, flatten yourself to the ground to impose Disadvantage.
You have Advantage on Intimidation checks (biological warning signals).
When attacked, flare your colors. The attacker must save (Will) or choose a new target.
You gain a Burrow speed of 15ft through loose soil or sand.
Dig a foxhole in 1 round. You gain Half-Cover while standing in that spot.
Turn Invisible until you move or attack by matching the background perfectly.
If you attack a target that hasn't seen you, you deal extra damage equal to your Level.
Make a Grapple attempt. If successful, the target takes Bludgeoning damage immediately.
When an enemy misses you with a weapon, attempt to Disarm them (catch the blade).
Your base Armor Class is 13 + Dexterity modifier (max +2).
Reduce damage from a non-magical slashing or piercing attack by half.
Make one attack roll against two adjacent enemies within your reach.
Gain +2 AC against one melee attack by blocking with your blades.
Make a piercing attack. On hit, leave the stinger in; target takes damage every turn until removed.
If you drop to 0 HP, make one immediate Stinger attack before falling.
Coat your next bite attack with poison. Target must save or be Poisoned for 1 minute.
Damage dealt by your fangs cannot be healed by non-magical means for 1 hour.
You can walk on walls and ceilings at full speed.
Advantage on checks to avoid being Disarmed or dropping an item.
You can detect the location of any moving creature on the ground within 30ft.
You can track a creature by pheromones or scent with Advantage on Survival checks.
You are immune to Insight checks; creatures cannot determine your emotions or next move.
Stare at a target. They must save (Will) or hesitate, losing their Reaction for the round.
Release a scent cloud. Allies within 10ft gain Temporary HP equal to your Proficiency Bonus.
Release a cloud. Enemies within 10ft must save or attack a random target next turn.
Make an attack that ignores the target's Armor Class bonus from shields or heavy armor.
Your critical hit range is 19-20 on piercing attacks.
You can trap air in your shell, allowing you to function underwater for 1 hour.
Advantage on saving throws against inhaled gases or Cloudkill effects.
You have Resistance to Acid damage and cannot be dissolved by slimes.
Advantage on checks to escape a Grapple or Web trap.
You can turn a 5ft square of ground into Difficult Terrain (rubble) as an Action.
You cannot be moved against your will while standing on natural earth/stone.
You can see in all directions at once. You cannot be Flanked.
You gain +2 to Reflex saves against Area of Effect spells (you see it coming).
If you have a target Grappled, deal Piercing damage to them automatically.
When an enemy misses you, you can jump over them to the opposite side (flanking position).
Fire a sticky net (30ft). Target must save (Dex) or be Restrained.
Produce up to 50ft of silk rope per day. It is strong enough to hold your weight.
Gain Advantage on a Saving Throw against a magical spell or effect.
You have Resistance to one damage type (Fire, Cold, or Lightning) chosen at creation.
